description: A large, rigid steel boom.  If attached to a frame it could be used to lift up to 20 metric tonnes.
A small, telescoping steel cantilever.  If attached to a frame it could be used to lift up to 3.5 metric tonnes.
A makeshift pallet lifter.  If attached to a frame it could be used to lift up to 0.5 metric tonnes.
A large, heavy, jagged metal disc for digging trenches.
An extendable metal pylon used to replace a portable jack.  If mounted to a vehicle, it could be used to lift it up.
A kickstand to keep a bike from falling over.  You could use this to lean a small vehicle forward or backward to change a tire.
